editorialNotes.standard: Step up to the plate as Ohtani, Soto, and other MLB greats in awesomely animated pitcher/batter duels.

ios.subtitle: Tap and bounce to a high score

editorialNotes.short: Tap to jump into as many crazy hoop challenges as possible.

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclip’s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

ios.subtitle: Play a star in soccer games!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever - and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

ios.subtitle: Build and play your own team!
Catch fish, be a master angler

editorialNotes.standard: Hit the slopes! Ski and snowboard through an action-packed sequel featuring bigger jumps, huge resorts, and a gorgeous open world.

editorialNotes.standard: EA knows how to make a good sports game. Impressive visuals? Check. Great animation? Check. Fun? Double check. The meat and bones here is collecting players and handcrafting a team so good it’d make Lebron and Steph jealous.

ios.subtitle: Flip ball and get into basket

editorialNotes.standard: Enter the world of Rocky Balboa with this tactically rich boxing simulation. Whether you play as Adonis “Creed” Johnson or design your own pugilist, dazzling graphics and fluid controls immerse you in the action. Swipe and tap to throw uppercuts and dodge body blows, maneuvering a global roster of opponents into position for the knockout. Training minigames upgrade your skills between bouts, but you’ll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to become the best.
Gorgeous real-world scenery, action-packed mini-games, and snappy controls keep us hooked on this beautiful fishing game.

ios.subtitle: Hit the ice and win big

editorialNotes.standard: From recruiting incoming freshmen to tracking player GPAs, this clever collegiate spin on Retro Bowl turns you into the big manager on campus.

ios.subtitle: Kick them all, make them fall!

editorialNotes.standard: Grand Mountain Adventure’s many mountains are packed with everything from long-jump challenges to twisty downhill runs peppered with bears and wolves. Whether enjoying a stress-free glide across the snow or double-backflipping off Finland’s peaks, we love how this game is as relaxing or challenging as we want it to be. With practice, the superb controls ensure that even the greenest novice can eventually feel like a pro.

Conquer street and sky in Gameloft’s fastest racing game yet, a mix of high-octane driving and incredible jumps that harkens back to the age of San Francisco Rush and classic Burnout. Pairing white-knuckle action with an array of career and online modes, it sets a new standard for arcade racers on the App Store.
LeBron. Luka. Giannis. Step into the shoes of household NBA names and take to the court in stunningly realistic matchups.

ios.subtitle: BRING YOUR DREAM SQUAD TO LIFE

editorialNotes.standard: Recruit b-ball greats and rule the court with your squad in this slick mobile version of NBA 2K24’s popular simulation mode.

ios.subtitle: Your Ultimate Team on the go
Kick the ball around the world
Level Up to Beat the Boss!

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a soccer star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldn’t be simpler—simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

ios.subtitle: Feel the Rush & Catch Big Ones
